scripts.watch: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/client/jsx/components/AppFeed.jsx src/client/jsx/components/AppSharer.jsx -v -o src/client/dist/js/app.js
scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/client/jsx/components/AppFeed.jsx src/client/jsx/components/AppSharer.jsx | uglifyjs -vmc warnings=false > src/client/dist/js/app.js
